remarks: Leading coefficient ideals are ideals.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Apr-2015.)
statement:
hbtlem.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
hbtlem.u $e |- U = ( LIdeal ` P ) $.
hbtlem.s $e |- S = ( ldgIdlSeq ` R ) $.
hbtlem2.t $e |- T = ( LIdeal ` R ) $.
hbtlem2 $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ I e. U /\ X e. NN0 ) -> ( ( S ` I ) ` X ) e. T ) $.
